title: The Princess in the Pyramid
description: Best friends Brianna and Eddie are a couple of typical kids who share a passion for Ancient Egypt. But this interest does not prepare them for an enchanted papyrus or an encounter with a mysterious girl from another time. Suddenly, the friends find themselves stuck in the land of the pyramids, where they must rescue a princess from an evil sorcerer. Will they be able to perform the impossible task? Or will they be trapped in Egypt forever? Lexile level 750-850 Recommended ages 9-12
author: Kathryn Johns
